includes.description: An array of globbing patterns of files/folders to include in the optimization

excludes.description: An array of globbing patterns of files/folders to exclude in the optimization

lossy.description: When set to true, images are compressed a lot more but with a slight quality loss that may not be visible to the human eye.

includes.description: An array of globbing patterns of files/folders to include in the optimization

excludes.description: An array of globbing patterns of files/folders to exclude in the optimization

lossy.description: When set to true, images are compressed a lot more but with a slight quality loss that may not be visible to the human eye.

warmupTime.description: Number of seconds to wait from the WebJob starts until it starts processing the file system
